title: How to Make Kit Kat Lasagna

steps.headline: Place the chocolate coated honeycomb into a resealable bag.
Use a rolling pin to roll back and forth and crush the honeycomb into large crumbs.
Sprinkle over the base layer of wafer biscuits.
steps.description: Cover it as well as possible. If you're running short, spread it out evenly.

steps.headline: Melt the white chocolate.
steps.description: Either melt it in a double boiler over the stove, or place in a microwave-proof bowl and microwave until melted.

steps.headline: Pour the melted chocolate over the crushed honeycomb layer.
steps.description: Completely cover this layer; melt more chocolate if needed.

steps.headline: Break the Kit Kat into single sticks.
Arrange the Kit Kat sticks across the top of the candy lasagna.
Place in the refrigerator to set.
steps.description: You might like to cover the dish, to prevent fridge odors from contaminating the wonderful candy taste.

tyn: Lasagna dish, standard size to large, up to you––adjust ingredients as needed
Double boiler for melting chocolate, or a microwave proof dish
